name: The Quest for Truth
description:
The  truth  is to be found.   Clues    are hidden.
You will have to solve   puzzles    and   jump   your way into the unknown.

The Quest For Truth is a 8-bit  platform game made for the Arduboy.   The whole thing is 31k and uses  less than 2K of ram.  Download the  binary file at:    github.com/GuillaumeElias/TheQuestForTruth/releases/
